entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SVG file is not converting to PNG properly. #12658
  • Windows Machine MAUI Drop Event from an external source causes Exception #12657
  • Can't access Color type in net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 #12655
  • MAUI Community Toolkit Popup Background Is Not Transparent #12654
  • Resizetizer error where appicon_background.png is in use by another process #12653
  • MAUI Community Toolkit Popup Displayed Out Window Bounds On MacCatalyst #12652
  • VS 2022 MAUI : App does not show mainpage on windows machine #12651
  • The same frame effect is written on different elements, but the design output is completely different. And now I want to know! #12650
  • .NET MAUI Issue with coding Xamarin form <Grid> Type #12649
  • MAUI FlexLayout incorrect height when wrapped #12648
  • Modal Page does not cover whole screen on WSA (MAUI) #12647
  • (.NET MAUI Windows) application window does not have a title #12646
  • Image in Radio Button Not Displayed in Android Platform #12645
  • App crash in Tab ShellContent page if any Entry control is there and changing tab and comeback to same tab #12644
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView scrolling doesn't work #12643
  • Microsoft .Net Maui Toolkit Cannot resolve type EventToCommandBehavior #12642
  • Maui Android Crash: Canvas: trying to draw too large(106099200bytes) bitmap. #12641
  • dotnet publish ends after hours with buffer overflow when publishing dotnet maui app. #12640
  • Support background image on splashscreen iOS #12639
  • [Android] Modal Page doesn't resize after keyboard disappears in entry field #12637
  • [Android 12+]Splash screen doesn't appear on maui app #12636
    Backlog
  • AppPackageFileExistsAsync Doesn't Work On Linked File with MAUI Assets #12635
  • Element.OnChildRemoved() - Incorrect variable used in function. #12633
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's Scrolled event not correct on windows #12632
    Backlog
  • `INavigation.PopModalAsync` fires `ApplyQueryAttributes` #12630
  • Button Set Glyph with converter or datatrigger #12629
    Backlog
  • Frame does not programmatically clear content consistently #12628
    Backlog

Closed

  • Contacts.PickContactAsync(); Throws exception even if rights are granted. (windows) #12595
  • How to disable bitcode strip for Google Sign In ? #12631
  • net6.0-android generated sources StyleCop error #12638
  • Permissions always returns "Granted" for Permissions.Photos in .net MAUI #12319

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BlazorWebView WinForms deadlock when disposing #12656
  • Allow to dynamically add/remove the Frame content #12634
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Flag valid measure status in iOS backing views to avoid repeat measuring #12627

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12574
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add PublicAPI to the Graphics projects #12601
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12626
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Give fallback width/height for Shapes prior to layout #12620
  • [net7.0] Add BlazorWebView binaries to xmldocs artifacts #12603
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials OrientationSensor API Docs #12604
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials MediaPicker API Docs #12605
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Permissions API Docs #12606
  • [net7.0] Update image source after recycling bitmap in custom target #12607
  • [net7.0] Allow CommunityToolkit to avoid reflection to access the CollectionView controller #12608
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12610
  • [net7.0] [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #12621

Updated

  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488
  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12573
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
